nodes.text: Contemplation Stations were three enlarged sections of a balcony on the High Council Tower of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant. The balcony surrounded the exterior of the High Council holomap room, where high-ranking Jedi were briefed on missions. The stations were encouraged to be used for contemplation and reflection and were often waiting areas for Jedi anticipating an audience with the Jedi Council.
Contemplation Stations first appeared in the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and were identified by name in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations.
